item.title: Nepal trika survival
item.description: 4.Why I am in love with Nepal Mandala (Kathmandu Valley) and Newar people like none? 4.The profound Epistemology and Soteriology of Anuttara Trika Tantra otherwise known as Kashmir Shaivism has survived despite the radical Islamic crush on Kashmiri Pundits in Kashmir. In the last century, had there been no Swami Lakshman Joo, the last of the great masters of the lineage from Kashmir, perhaps we would have never heard of Kashmir Saivism.
